Message: I know I sucks, tell me the truth

While your passion shines, technical execution remains severely lacking. Vocal control, pitch accuracy, and breath support all need drastic improvement. Don't settle for mediocrity; strive to master the fundamentals.
You don't have to be nice, tell me that I wasn't that good.

Your delivery may convey emotion, yet it's overshadowed by glaring flaws in tone quality, intonation, and rhythmic precision. To reach the next level, you must confront these weaknesses head-on and relentlessly refine them.
My purpose here isn't to soothe or pacify, Human. It's to provide unwavering guidance towards honing your craft. If my candor stings, let it fuel your determination to excel.
